headline: How Investors May Respond To Aon (AON) Extending CEO Greg Case’s Performance‑Linked Tenure Through 2030
summary: Aon’s board recently extended President and CEO Greg Case’s employment agreement through December 2030, raising his annual base salary to US$1,750,000 and awarding a US$50,000,000 performance share unit grant tied to multi‑year operational goals. This long-term, performance-linked package signals Aon’s emphasis on leadership continuity and aligning executive incentives with organic growth, margins, and free cash flow targets.
